snp4.2:772: Satto guhāyaṁ bahunābhichanno,Tiṭṭhaṁ naro mohanasmiṁ pagāḷho;Dūre vivekā hi tathāvidho so,Kāmā hi loke na hi suppahāyā.
snp4.2:773: Icchānidānā bhavasātabaddhā,Te duppamuñcā na hi aññamokkhā;Pacchā pure vāpi apekkhamānā,Ime va kāme purime va jappaṁ.
snp4.2:774: Kāmesu giddhā pasutā pamūḷhā,Avadāniyā te visame niviṭṭhā;Dukkhūpanītā paridevayanti,Kiṁsū bhavissāma ito cutāse.
snp4.2:775: Tasmā hi sikkhetha idheva jantu,Yaṁ kiñci jaññā visamanti loke;Na tassa hetū visamaṁ careyya,Appañhidaṁ jīvitamāhu dhīrā.
snp4.2:776: Passāmi loke pariphandamānaṁ,Pajaṁ imaṁ taṇhagataṁ bhavesu;Hīnā narā maccumukhe lapanti,Avītataṇhāse bhavābhavesu.
snp4.2:777: Mamāyite passatha phandamāne,Maccheva appodake khīṇasote;Etampi disvā amamo careyya,Bhavesu āsattimakubbamāno.
snp4.2:778: Ubhosu antesu vineyya chandaṁ,Phassaṁ pariññāya anānugiddho;Yadattagarahī tadakubbamāno,Na lippatī diṭṭhasutesu dhīro.
snp4.2:779: Saññaṁ pariññā vitareyya oghaṁ,Pariggahesu muni nopalitto;Abbūḷhasallo caramappamatto,Nāsīsatī lokamimaṁ parañcāti.
